name: Various Code Competition
summary: Many code competition exists online, providing many programming challenges, with automatic ways to check for correctness.
size: Probably around 100,000 problems can be found online.
notes: Existing platforms include SPOJ, Codewars, Codeforces, UVa Online Judge, Kattis, CodeChef, TopCoder, LeetCode, HackerRank, GeeksforGeeks, AtCoder, TechGig, HackerEarth, LiveCodeBench, Project Euler, Advent of Code, CodinGame, CodeCombat, Google Contests, Kaggle, CheckiO
